name: nfrecs

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, crecs(c0))
-| wceq(crecs(c0), cwrecs(cep, con0, c0))
-| wnfc(s0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ F/(s0, recs(c0))
⊣ recs(c0)= wrecs(∈, On, c0)
⊣ F/(s0, wrecs(∈, On, c0))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for ` recs ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Jan-2015.)
